actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic River Act by designating a segment of the New River in North Carolina as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates a specified segment of the New River in North Carolina as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic River Act by designating a segment of the New River in North Carolina as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
